column6: the Anti-Cyber Crime Departtment sent two Cambodians
column7: three Nigerians and two Pakistanis to the court.------The group were operating 419 internet scams
column9: but really taking money swindled for ‘processing’ fees.------After receiving a complaint from a victim
column10: police investigated and detained the seven suspects on January 30
column11: 2019.------Authorities continue to advise people to be aware of online fraud
column12: and never send money to strangers.
